description.value: You've raised your megafauna companion to be a more powerful force on the battlefield than most of its kind. The companion you gained through the Mammoth Lord Dedication feat becomes a mature animal companion, granting it additional capabilities. During an encounter, even if you don't use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Command an Animal] action, your megafauna animal companion can still use 1 action on your turn to Stride or Strike.
